step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
You are doing great with the fist making and pushing down motion, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Excellent work on the arm stretch overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
You are performing the push down pumping motion well, squeezing your shoulder blades together as you inhale.
Great job completing the first repetition by stretching your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
For the second repetition, ensure you maintain a comfortable seated or standing position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
Continue to make a fist while pushing down with your arms, squeezing your shoulder blades together and inhaling.
You are doing well with the arm stretch overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
Keep up the good work on the push down pumping motion, squeezing your shoulder blades together as you inhale.
Fantastic job completing the exercise by stretching your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing. You've finished both repetitions!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while pushing down and squeezing your shoulder blades. Finish by stretching arms overhead while exhaling.
